title: Red Hat AI InstructLab for IBM Cloud
introduction: Get ready to dive into AI! InstructLab is an open source project created by IBM and Red Hat to be a cost-effective entry point into the world of machine learning.

section_highlights.title: What is AI?
section_highlights.description: If you're new to AI solutions, learn the basics concepts.

section_highlights.title: Red Hat: What is InstructLab?
section_highlights.description: Learn about InstructLab as an AI solution.

section_highlights.title: IBM Think: What is InstructLab?
section_highlights.description: InstructLab is a method for training AI models that is meant to significantly improve LLMs used in the development of gen AI applications.

section_highlights.title: Red Hat Boosts Enterprise AI Across the Hybrid Cloud with Red Hat AI
section_highlights.description: AI portfolio adds enhancements to Red Hat OpenShift AI and Red Hat Enterprise Linux AI to help operationalize AI strategies.
